Detailed Description

Perspective calibration.

This class describe a perspective calibration. You need this calibration when your logical coordination system is flat, but not orthogonal to camera axis. Please note, that logical coordination system represents only finite rectangle area, you can set using SetBounds(const i2d::CRectangle&) method.
